question: The Indian Railways is expected to be electrified by which year, as per the recent statement of the Union Railway Minister?
explanation:
The Union Railway Minister Piyush Goyal recently announced that the Indian Railways is set to run entirely on electricity by the year 2024 and diesel locomotives are gradually been pushed out of service. Once achieved, India will have the first railway network in the world to be run completely on electricity. 
He announced this during the India-Brazil Business Forum, which was organised during Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro\'s official visit to India. The Minister also hoped to make the entire railways network a net-zero emission network by 2030, which will use clean energy and clean power.
